thread.title: Ernest Penfold
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Ernest Penfold

author: Ernest Penfold
title: Ernest Penfold
text: I found this jacket at a much reduced price. I think it was £170 elsewhere, I found it for £116 on another site, and got it for £106 here. In addition, a message 'popped up' as I was on the website offering another 5% off. I have yet to try the jacket in really foul weather but I'm sure it will be fine as it gets great reviews. Brilliant service and from what I have read, a fabulous returns policy. Would not hesitate to recommend this company.
